Posts.Content: Dmacminn11 wrote: hello, I am 45 and recently had my first mammogram. I was told that I need an ultrasound due to scattered calcifications all over my left breast. I am scheduled to go for the ultrasound in 5 days. I am very worried and wondering if anyone else had a similar experience. The technician could only tell me that scattered is better than clustered calcifications. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Calcifications Dmacminn11 djmammo
